title: 将医疗AI局限在严肃领域：百川M3 Plus首创“证据锚定”，幻觉率2.6%刷新全球纪录
description: 人们对医疗人工智能的担忧不是它的说话能力，而是它说话不准确的倾向。
titleZh: 将医疗AI局限在严肃领域：百川M3 Plus首创“证据锚定”，幻觉率2.6%刷新全球纪录
titleEn: Confining Medical AI to the Serious Domain: Baichuan M3 Plus Pioneers "Evidence Anchoring," Setting a New Global Record with 2.6% Hallucination Rate

title: 人工智能将带来经济繁荣，但导火线漫长
description: 一旦我们成功转动这些关键的“生产过程可替代性”调节旋钮，逐步消除系统中拥有否决权的瓶颈，经济增长就能摆脱引力约束，从线性摩擦走向真正的指数级飞跃。
titleZh: 人工智能将带来经济繁荣，但导火线漫长
titleEn: AI Will Bring an Economic Boom, But the Fuse is Long
descriptionZh: 一旦我们成功转动这些关键的“生产过程可替代性”调节旋钮，逐步消除系统中拥有否决权的瓶颈，经济增长就能摆脱引力约束，从线性摩擦走向真正的指数级飞跃。
descriptionEn: Once we successfully turn these critical "production process substitutability" adjustment knobs, step by step eliminating the system's bottlenecks that hold veto power, economic growth can break free from gravitational constraints, moving from linear friction to a true exponential leap.

title: 斯坦福 × NVIDIA 推出全新 AI 推理范式，跨领域刷新 SOTA
description: 斯坦福大学和 NVIDIA 联合发布了一篇重要论文《TTT-Discover》，打破了“模型训练后固定”的铁律。
titleZh: 斯坦福 × NVIDIA 推出全新 AI 推理范式，跨领域刷新 SOTA
titleEn: Stanford × NVIDIA Unveils New AI Inference Paradigm, Refreshing SOTA Across Multiple Fields
descriptionZh: 斯坦福大学和 NVIDIA 联合发布了一篇重要论文《TTT-Discover》，打破了“模型训练后固定”的铁律。
descriptionEn: Stanford and NVIDIA jointly released a significant paper, TTT-Discover, breaking the iron law of "models being fixed after training." It enables AI to "grow brains on the spot" for specific difficult problems during the inference stage, willing to spend hundreds of dollars in computing power just to achieve a record-breaking extreme. From rewriting mathematical conjectures to surpassing human coding speed, this "radical evolution" is redefining the boundaries of machine discovery.

descriptionZh: 一盏孤独的绿灯照亮了寂静，在朦胧中托着珍本。
descriptionEn: A lone green lamp illuminates stillness, holding rare books in obscurity.

title: 陶哲轩给予认可，GPT-5.2 狂野起来，我们注定要成为“硅基 Palus”吗？
description: 加密爱好者 Neel Somani 用 GPT-5.2 猛烈地踢开了数学神圣殿堂的大门。
titleZh: 陶哲轩给予认可，GPT-5.2 狂野起来，我们注定要成为“硅基 Palus”吗？
titleEn: Terence Tao Gives His Stamp of Approval, GPT-5.2 Goes Wild, Are We Destined to Become 'Silicon-based Palus'?
descriptionZh: 加密爱好者 Neel Somani 用 GPT-5.2 猛烈地踢开了数学神圣殿堂的大门。
descriptionEn: Crypto enthusiast Neel Somani violently kicked open the door to the sacred temple of mathematics with GPT-5.2. Terence Tao personally verified it, but this is not 'AI Ascending to Godhood'; it's a computational power mining operation with a mere 1% success rate. When mathematical proofs become an industrial assembly line, what we lose is not just genius, but also the last shred of reverence for truth.

titleEn: The AI Video Crossroads: Sora Faces Monetization Hurdles, Kling Focuses on Practicality, Dreamina Builds an Ecosystem
descriptionZh: 视频创作的门槛永久降低，释放了更多人的想象力。
descriptionEn: The barrier to video creation has been permanently lowered, unleashing the imagination of more people. Whoever can build a sustainable ecosystem while lowering this barrier will define the future of video AI.

title: OpenAI CFO：人工智能要想长期赚钱，广告必须像功能一样
description: OpenAI 首席财务官 Sarah Friar 表示：商业化必须融入体验中。
titleZh: OpenAI CFO：人工智能要想长期赚钱，广告必须像功能一样
titleEn: OpenAI CFO: For AI to Make Money Long-Term, Ads Must Be Like Features
descriptionZh: OpenAI 首席财务官 Sarah Friar 表示：商业化必须融入体验中。
descriptionEn: OpenAI CFO Sarah Friar says: Commercialization must be integrated into the experience. If it doesn't create value, it shouldn't exist. Behind this statement lies OpenAI's understanding of AI commercialization: it's not simply selling software or slapping on ads, but making commercialization itself a part of the product's value.
